page.title: 15STAFFORD NEWSLETTER JUNE 21
page.content:
{SURPRISE,SURPRISE,ITS ZEBRA FIVE} Early last Sunday a cross-collie puppy was found in an ambulance at Stafford District General Hospital.The crew named him Zebra Five after the call sign of their vehicle.He was obviously abandoned but is now being well looked after.
{600,000 POUND INDIAN ORDER FOR G.E.C.} G.E.C.Switchgear Ltd. is to supply transformers for a new power station in India.The order was won against fierce competition from other European manufacturers. The division also has orders from the United States and Oman,and is completing work for Malaya and Bangladesh.
